name: Jesus
description: Jesus Christ flashes before your eyes as you nearly escape death.

levelEditorLayer.name: Level Editor
levelEditorLayer.description:
Show Jesus when playtesting levels in the level editor.

<cy>If this feature is causing crashes for you, please</c> <cr>DISABLE IT</c><cy>.</c>

volume.name: Volume (%)
volume.description: Set the volume of the bell (or custom sound effect you've chosen) as a percentage.

skipInvisibleObjects.name: Skip Invisible Objects
skipInvisibleObjects.description:
Decide if you want to see Jesus when you are near invisible spikes/hazards.

<cy>Jesus will still appear when you are near objects that have been explicitly disabled by</c> <cr>Tog</c><cg>gle</c> <cy>triggers.</c>

sensitivity.name: Sensitivity
sensitivity.description:
The minimum distance between the player hitbox and a spike hitbox required for Him (or your custom image) to appear.

The higher this value, the further away you can be from a spike in order to see Jesus.

customImage.name: Custom Image
customImage.description:
If you would like a custom image to show instead of Jesus, choose one here.

<cy>If you're using Geode v3.6.0 or higher and want to see Jesus (by default), ignore the red "Value must be a file" text.</c>

customSound.name: Custom Sound
customSound.description:
If you would like a custom audio file to play instead of a bell, choose one here.

<cy>If you're using Geode v3.6.0 or higher and want to hear the bell (by default), ignore the red "Value must be a file" text.</c>
